word:
Each Paper Has a Distinctive Work.--I wish it to be distinctly understood . . . that I have no faith in 


                                                       229 

consolidating the work of publication, blending in one that which should remain separate. The blending of the Signs and the American Sentinel [RELIGIOUS LIBERTY PAPER PUBLISHED BY THE REVIEW AND HERALD.] will not be in the order of God. Each has its distinctive work to do. The Signs is a pioneer paper to do a special work. . . .
